mapper.select: SELECT M.NO, M.NAME AS NAME, P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, D.NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN POSITION P ON M.POSITION_NO = P.NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON M.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.NO WHERE M.NAME = #{name}

SELECT R.NO AS OPERATING_ROOM_NO, R.LOCATION AS OPERATING_ROOM_LOCATION, S.PATIENT_NO AS PATIENT_NO, P.NAME AS NAME, R.STATUS AS OPERATING_ROOM_STATUS, S.STATUS AS STATUS FROM OPERATING_ROOM R LEFT JOIN OPERATION_SCHEDULE S ON R.NO = S.OPERATING_ROOM_NO LEFT JOIN PATIENT P ON P.NO = S.PATIENT_NO
SELECT NO FROM PATIENT WHERE NAME = #{patientName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPERATION_SCHEDULE(NO, OPERATING_ROOM_NO, PATIENT_NO, OPERATION_NAME, START_DATE, STATUS, OPERATION_RECORD) VALUES(SEQ_OPERATION_SCHEDULE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{operatingRoomNo}, #{patientNo}, #{operationName}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI'), #{status}, #{operationRecord})
INSERT INTO PARTICIPANT (NO, PARTICIPANT_NO, OPERATION_SCHEDULE_NO) VALUES (SEQ_PARTICIPANT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{value}, SEQ_OPERATION_SCHEDULE_NO.CURRVAL)
mapper.update: UPDATE OPERATING_ROOM SET STATUS = 'O' WHERE NO = #{operatingRoomNo}
mapper.select: SELECT S.NO AS OPERATION_NO, S.OPERATION_NAME AS OPERATION_NAME, P.NAME AS PATIENT_NAME, S.STATUS AS STATUS, S.START_DATE, S.END_DATE FROM OPERATION_SCHEDULE S JOIN PATIENT P ON S.PATIENT_NO = P.NO ORDER BY S.NO DESC

SELECT S.NO AS OPERATION_NO, S.OPERATION_NAME AS OPERATION_NAME, S.START_DATE, S.END_DATE, S.OPERATION_RECORD, P.NAME AS PATIENT_NAME, S.OPERATING_ROOM_NO FROM OPERATION_SCHEDULE S JOIN OPERATING_ROOM R ON S.OPERATING_ROOM_NO = R.NO JOIN PATIENT P ON S.PATIENT_NO = P.NO WHERE S.NO = #{operationNo}
SELECT COUNT(NO) FROM PARTICIPANT WHERE OPERATION_SCHEDULE_NO = #{operationNo}
SELECT PARTICIPANT_NO FROM PARTICIPANT WHERE OPERATION_SCHEDULE_NO = #{operationNo}
SELECT M.NAME AS NAME, P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN POSITION P ON M.POSITION_NO = P.NO WHERE M.NO = #{i}
mapper.update: UPDATE OPERATION_SCHEDULE SET END_DATE = TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI'), STATUS = #{status} WHERE NO = #{operationNo}
UPDATE OPERATING_ROOM SET STATUS = 'X' WHERE NO = #{operatingRoomNo}
